resources.string: No network detected. Please connect to the internet.

Ndilapha ukuza kunceda yonke imibuzo enxulumene nokukhulelwa.\n Ndibuze imibuzo malunga nokugula kwasekuseni, i-pre-eclampsia, abasebenzi kunye nokukhulelwa iingcebiso. \n Ndiyakwazi ukuphendula imibuzo malunga nosana lwakho olutsha.

string.name: instruction_eng
string.i: I\'m here to help with all your pregnancy related questions.\n Ask me questions about morning sickness, pre-eclampsia, labour and pregnancy advice. I can even answer questions about your newborn baby."
